text.div:
This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Include all codes defined in http://fhir.org/guides/who/anc-cds/CodeSystem/anc-custom-codes
  • Include all codes defined in http://loinc.org
  • Include all codes defined in http://terminology.kemkes.go.id/CodeSystem/clinical-term
  • Include all codes defined in http://terminology.kemkes.go.id/CodeSystem/examination
  • Include codes from http://snomed.info/sct where concept is-a 116312005 (Finding of lower limb)
  • Include codes from http://snomed.info/sct where concept is-a 116337000 (Oral cavity finding)
  • Include codes from http://snomed.info/sct where concept is-a 297268004 (Ear, nose and throat finding)

name: Observationcode
title: Value set specific for Observation Code
description: Value set specific for Observation Code
